Use
[keywords and phrases to search for](https://services.austintexas.gov/edims/search.cfm)
:

**• Council Meeting Records**
, including records of special called Council meetings and meetings of the Austin Housing Finance Corporation (AHFC), Tax Increment Financing (TIF) Boards, and Mueller Local Government Corporation (MLGC)

Browse the
[Archives of City Council Meeting Minutes](https://www.austintexas.gov/department/city-council/archive/city_council_meeting_archives.htm)
by year and meeting date from the late 19th century to the present
